DOC.brief_summary: This research conduct study reliability method use measure rest metabolic rate , much energy person expend rest .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 65 year old BMI 19 40 kg/m2 Women must pregnant plan become pregnant Age le 18 great 65 BMI less 19 great 40 Tobacco use Taking medication affect metabolic rate ( unless weight stable past 3 month ) Any disease affect metabolic rate
